statements: SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT driver_id, route_name FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT driver_id, route_name FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE ST_X(current_location) > 50;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE last_updated_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_name = 'Route 1' ORDER BY last_updated_at DESC;
SELECT driver_id, route_name, ST_X(current_location) AS latitude, ST_Y(current_location) AS longitude FROM delivery_routes WHERE last_updated_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY last_updated_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT driver_id FROM delivery_routes WHERE ST_Distance(current_location, POINT(0, 0)) < 1000;
SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) AS num_deliveries FROM delivery_routes GROUP BY route_name HAVING num_deliveries > 5 ORDER BY num_deliveries DESC;
SELECT driver_id, ST_AsText(current_location) AS geolocation FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT driver_name, latitude, longitude FROM drivers JOIN locations ON drivers.driver_id = locations.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_drivers FROM drivers;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driver_id FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers JOIN locations ON drivers.driver_id = locations.driver_id ORDER BY driver_name ASC, latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_routes;
SELECT route_name, current_location FROM driver_routes WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, current_location, last_update FROM driver_routes ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT driver_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM driver_locations WHERE driver_id = 2 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT route_id, driver_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes_history WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT * FROM driver_routes;
SELECT route_name, current_location, last_update FROM driver_routes WHERE driver_id = 5;
SELECT driver_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM driver_locations ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_id, driver_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes_history WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(*) AS location_count FROM driver_locations GROUP BY driver_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_id FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT location_name, timestamp FROM locations WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_id FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_id FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 50 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT location_name, timestamp FROM locations WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE route_id = 3 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name FROM vehicles WHERE driver_id = 2 AND type_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name AS Driver, vehicle_name AS Vehicle, type_name AS Type FROM drivers d JOIN vehicles v ON d.driver_id = v.driver_id JOIN vehicle_types vt ON v.type_id = vt.type_id;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT DISTINCT driver_id FROM vehicles WHERE type_id = 2;
SELECT route_name, location_name FROM routes INNER JOIN locations ON routes.route_id = locations.route_id WHERE routes.route_id = 1;
